content.en: Dental age estimation: Researchers have been exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to estimate dental age. These algorithms have shown promise in accurately predicting dental age based on X-ray images, orthopantomogram images, and other dental parameters. By using artificial intelligence and neural networks, researchers have found that these algorithms can provide more accurate age assessments, especially for specific populations such as children with growth delay.
content.da: Aldersbestemmelse ved hjælp af tandlæger: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at estimere tandalder. Disse algoritmer har vist lovende resultater i præcist at forudsige tandalder baseret på røntgenbilleder, ortopantomogrambilleder og andre tandparametre. Ved brug af kunstig intelligens og neurale netværk har forskere fundet, at disse algoritmer kan give mere nøjagtige aldersvurderinger, især for specifikke populationer såsom børn med væksthæmning.
